code: import React from'react';import{injectIntl}from'react-intl';import DropzoneComponent from'../../components/dropzone/dropzone.component';var AddFile=function AddFile(props){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(DropzoneComponent,{name:"AttachmentFile",label:props.intl.formatMessage({id:"IDS_FILE"}),isMandatory:true,maxFiles:1,accept:".xlsx, .xls",minSize:0,maxSize:10,onDrop:function onDrop(event){return props.onDrop(event,'stemplatefilename',1);},editFiles:props.selectedRecord?props.selectedRecord:{},multiple:1,fileSizeName:"nfilesize",fileName:"stemplatefilename",deleteAttachment:props.deleteAttachment,actionType:props.actionType,fileNameLength:100,attachmentTypeCode:props.editFiles&&props.editFiles.nattachmenttypecode});};export default injectIntl(AddFile);
